SELECT R.R_NO, M.M_NAME, R.M_NO, R.R_CONTENT FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.M_NO =M.M_NO) WHERE R.R_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{text} ||'%' OR M.M_NAME LIKE '%' || #{text} || '%' ORDER BY R.R_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.M_NO =M.M_NO) WHERE R.R_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{text} ||'%' OR M.M_NAME LIKE '%' || #{text} || '%' ORDER BY R.R_NO
